message.name: BIND_RC
message.description: link="A2R" request check result check rc bind_state broadcast serial code and ack

message.name: AIRCRAFT_BIND_STATE
message.description: link="broadcast" message broadcase between xbee communication initial and binded

message.name: AIRCRAFT_INFO_STATE
message.description: link="A2G",after binded,send serial number autopilot software and so on engine_type : 1 = Electricity , 2 = Fuel, 3 = Hybrid misc_status: bit0:joystick-enable bit1: u-blox_enable

message.name: HEART_BEAT_AC_GCS_STATE
message.description:
link="A2G" ,request GCS check time_out of HB message to determine AC is lost flight_status: bit1: 0=ac_unready; 1=ac_ready bit2: 0=motors_locked; 1=motors_unlocked bit3: 0=on_ground; 1=in_flight bit4: 0=manual_mode; 1=auto_mode bit5: 0=back_home; 1=others bit6: 0=take_off; 1=others bit7: 0=landing; 1=others bit8: 0=spray_stop; 1=spray_open reserve other bits keep 0
error_code: respect emergency states,bit1 to bit32, not used bits reserve 0 emergency state bit(0=ok, 1=error) BAT_LOW 1 (able to back home) BAT_CRITICAL 2 (can't continual flight) BAT_OTHERS 3 IMU_MOMENTARY 4 IMU_MAG_EMI 5 IMU_CRITICAL 6 HEIGHT_SONAR 7 HEIGHT_BARO 8 HEIGHT_BOTH 9 BOARD_TEMP 10 BOARD_OUT 11 GCS_COM_LOST 12 (communication lost) RC_COM_LOST 13 GPS_ACC 14 (gps pos precision) GPS_LOST 15 OPS_EMPTY 16 OPS_LOST 17 LIFT_POWER 18 TASK_RUNOVER 19 TASK_PARSE 20 TASK_BREAK 21 (auto_task break) MODE_CONVERT_A2M 22 (mode convert to manual,auto_task break) OPS_BLOCKED 23 GPS_UBLOX_FAIL 24 NO_AVOID_PATH 25 P_IN_OBS_AREA 26 NO_VALID_P 27 OBS_INFO_ERROR 28
reserve other bits keep 0 selftest_code: express ac power on selftest information high8bit 1=battery_check; 2=board_check; 3=imu_check; 4=baro_check; 5=ops_check; 6=gps_check; 7=calibration; 8=ap_check; 9=link_check low8bit 0=pass others=error task_action : 1= FLIGHT_LINE 2=SPRAY_LINE 3=SPRAY_CONVERT 4=HOVERING 5=TERMINATION 6=AVOID_OBSTACLE

message.name: CURRENT_TASK_STATE
message.description: link="A2G" state: reached=1(arriving at wp_current_id); passed=2(aready pass wp_current_id,flight to next wp);

message.name: TASK_ACK_STATE
GET_TASK_ACK_STATE
message.description: link="A2G" use to ack the gcs "GET_TASK" messages wp_type: coordinate wgs84 = 1, relative_ENU = 2

message.name: SET_COMMAND_ACK_STATE
message.description: link="A2G" use to ack the gcs SET_COMMAND messages response 0=success, others=error_code 7=create area param unnomal 8=creat area fail

message.name: HEART_BEAT_AC_RC_STATE
message.description: link="A2R" ,use ack RC heartbeat message period=1s if battery/pesticides parameter=-1,meant get the information fail last_response=response of message "RC_SET_CMD_ACK_STATE" use ack AC heart_beat message

message.name: LAND_TASK_ACK_STATE
message.description: link="A2G" use to ack the gcs task messages response 0=success, others=error_code

message.name: EMERGENCY_RECORD_STATE
message.description: link="A2G" use to ack the gcs task messages wp_type: coordinate wgs84 = 1, relative_ENU = 2 spray_status: spraying=1, stop_spraying=2 send continual until gcs ack "EMERGENCY_RECORD_ACK_STATE" message

message.name: CALIBRATION_AC_RC_STATE
message.description: link="A2R" use ack RC calibration cmd message calibration_ack get set cmd=0, calibrate success=1, calibrate fail=2

message.name: AIRCRAFT_BIND_ACK_STATE
message.description: link="A2G" message use to ack gcs bind result, response: 0=fail, 1=success

message.name: P_BORDER_ACK
message.description: link="A2G" use to ack the add area info. response 0=success, others=error_code

message.name: P_OBSTACLE_ACK
message.description: link="A2G" use to ack the add area info. response 0=success, others=error_code

message.name: UPGRADE_RESPONSE
message.description: link="A2G" Request upgrade response. type: AC=1, OPS=2, BBOX=3 state: OK=0, BUSY=2,3,4.

message.name: UPGRADE_STATUS
message.description: link="A2G" AC upgrade status ready ok. type: AC=1, OPS=2, BBOX=3

message.name: REQUESET_FIRMWARE
message.description: link="A2G" AC request fireware data: type: AC=1, OPS=2, BBOX=3 frame: Current_frame=1, Next_frame=2

message.name: UPGRADE_RESULT
message.description: link="A2G" AC upgrade success or fail. type: AC=1, OPS=2, BBOX=3 status: Success=0, Fail=1

message.name: SET_CONFIG
SET_COMMAND
message.description: link="G2A" id:1=gcs_cmd value: start=1; pause=2; continual=3; back_home=4; reserve_land=5; direct_land=6; lock_motors=7 2=request "AIRCRAFT_INFO_STATE" message, value=null aircraft will ack with "SET_COMMAND_ACK_STATE" message 3=delete all task(if AC in_flight,gived gcs_cmd=pause before delete) 4=ops self clean(value: start=1; stop=0) 5=ops channel control, bit of value express the channel, eg.0x0F set four channels open

message.name: ADD_TASK
UPDATE_TASK
DELETE_TASK
message.description: link="G2A" aircraft will ack with "TASK_ACK_STATE" message using task_code

message.name: GET_TASK
message.description: link="G2A" aircraft will ack with "GET_TASK_ACK_STATE" message using task_code

message.name: BIND_AIRCRAFT
message.description: link="G2A" aircraft will ack with "AIRCRAFT_INFO_STATE" message

message.name: LAND_TASK
message.description: link="G2A" operation_type: add=1, update=2(all update), delete=3(all delete) land_type: home=1, reserve_land=2 ,transfer_point=3 wp_type: coordinate wgs84 = 1, relative_ENU = 2 aircraft will ack with "LAND_TASK_ACK_STATE" message note:home waypoint is requested and unique, reserve_land waypoints are optional(numbers:0--5)

message.name: ADD_BORDER_INFO
message.description: link="G2A" aircraft will ack with "P_BORDER_ACK" message using task_code

message.name: ADD_OBSTACLE_INFO
message.description: link="G2A" aircraft will ack with "P_OBSTACLE_ACK" message using task_code

message.name: HEART_BEAT_GCS_STATE
message.description: link="G2A" when gcs lost ac_heart_beat message,it will trigger

message.name: EMERGENCY_RECORD_ACK_STATE
message.description: link="G2A" when gcs success get "EMERGENCY_RECORD_STATE" msg ,ack AC with it response 0=success, others=error_code

message.name: HEART_BEAT_VRC_STATE
message.description: link="G2A"

message.name: GCS_VRC_MOTION_CMD
message.description: link="G2A", no ack

message.name: GCS_VRC_SET_CMD
message.description: link="G2A", no ack

message.name: REQUEST_UPGRADE
message.description: link="G2A" Request upgrade AC firmware. type: AC=1, OPS=2, BBOX=3

message.name: QUERY_UPGRADE_STATUS
message.description: link="G2A" Query module firmware upgrade status: type: AC=1, OPS=2, BBOX=3

message.name: GCS_READY_OK
message.description: link="G2A" GCS upgrade ready ok: type: AC=1, OPS=2, BBOX=3

message.name: GCS_SEND_FIRMWARE
message.description: link="G2A" Send a frame data: type: AC=1, OPS=2, BBOX=3 data: default a frame firmware data length is 140.

message.name: END_UPGRADE
message.description: link="G2A" GCS end firmware upgrade: DATA1:type: AC=1, OPS=2, BBOX=3 DATA2:bin checksum high byte DATA3:bin checksum low byte DATA4:bin length msb_1 DATA5:bin length 2 DATA6:bin length 3 DATA7:bin length lsb_4

message.name: RC_MOTION_CMD
message.description: link="R2A"

message.name: RC_SET_CMD
message.description: link="R2A"

message.name: RC_BIND_STATE
message.description: link="broadcase"

message.name: HEART_BEAT_RC_STATE
message.description: link="R2A"

message.name: CALIBRATION_RESULT_RC_ACK_STATE
message.description: link="R2A" ack success=1

message.name: LC_BIND_STATE
message.description: link="broadcase"

message.name: HEART_BEAT_LC_STATE
message.description: link="R2A"
